channel.title: Help Please -Probably Simple-
channel.description:
I Have Been Hosting My Server For About A Week Now And All Of A Sudden When I Load Up The Source And Try To Connect My Server Using The Right Client With The Correct Ip Adress Nothing Happens, Not Even A Error Appears On The Source And The Client Just Says "Error Connecting To Server".
Can Anyone Help Please? All Suggestion Apreciated :) Thanks!!

item.title: Help Please -Probably Simple-

item.description:
@bluebort wrote:

I think i was being stupid! lol
i needed to update jdk, i guess that would help
dw i will im you if this dont work

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bluebort bluebort
item.description:
@bluebort wrote:

yeh lol i’ve done all that!

when some1 logs online it says (on the source) “client connecting”
nothing happens when i try to connect…

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please -Probably Simple-
item.dc:creator: @dirtynife dirtynife
item.description:
@dirtynife wrote:

Well this is how there suppose to work.

The person that has coded the server just run’s the source’s run.bat
The other players just run the client’s run.bat and log-in onto the server

What you should do is that you get a client and edit the client.java and find “127.”
Edit that 127.00 (something like that) to your ip address.

Compile and send that client’s run.bat to the players and that’s it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please -Probably Simple-
item.dc:creator: @bluebort bluebort
item.description:
@bluebort wrote:

I’ve Compiled The Source And The Server And Nothing Happened.

Yes It’s A No-Ip Duc Address And I’ve Port Forwarded Correctly And Still Nothing Happened

My Server Worked Before But It’s Not Now?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Please -Probably Simple-
item.dc:creator: @Cuban0_Ftw Cuban0 Ftw
item.description:
@Cuban0_Ftw wrote:

Well make sure the IP is in No-IP duc and it’s registered, if you’ve done that make sure that you have port forwarded correctly. By saying “load up the source” you mean that you pressed run, if not then yeah press run on your source.

Read full topic

I dunno, but I say compile your server and run it.
